articles.author: Chloe Morgan
articles.title: Designer Grace Han says sales DOUBLED after Kate Middleton was seen carrying her bag - Daily Mail
articles.description: Taiwanese born British designer Grace Han, who is in her mid thirties, said she was 'thrilled' to see Kate Middleton, 39, carrying her Love Letter Top Handle design, with the small costing £1,595.
articles.content:
A Taiwanese born British designer has revealed that sales doubled after Kate Middleton was seen carrying one of her bags on three separate royal engagements.

articles.author: Kate Nicholson
articles.title: Meghan Markle’s claim passport was ‘turned over’ to Palace under scrutiny: ‘It’s routine' - Daily Express
articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE claimed that she had to hand her passport and keys when she became a royal - but commentators believe that may be 'routine' for members of the Firm.
